DOC.brief_summary: The study is to investigate the effect of succinylated gelatin on the blood viscosity and oxygen delivery in patients during surgeries, so as to have a better understanding of the safety in the use of succinylated gelatin for surgical patients.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Succinylated Gelatin on the Blood Viscosity and Oxygen Delivery
DOC.criteria: Patients between the ages of 18 years and 60 years ASA physical status I and II surgical procedures requiring general anesthesia with continuous CVP and arterial pressure monitoring Patients younger than 16 y or older than 60 y Body Mass Index (BMI) <18 or >30 Allergy to any of the drugs used Severe cardiovascular dysfunction Patient refusal
